entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023
